alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Jasper; Madison; Polk; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Polk, far south central Story, northeastern Madison, west central Jasper and southeastern Dallas Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms from near Van Meter northeast to Ankeny, moving northeast at 25 mph. These storms have produced brief wind gusts to 40 to 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorms will be near ...Waukee and Jordan Creek Town Center around 655 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Urbandale, Valley West Mall, West Des Moines, Clive, Des Moines Int`l Airport, Johnston, Grimes, Windsor Heights, Merle Hay Mall, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center, Iowa Events Center, Principal Park, Des Moines, Saylorville, Ankeny, Pleasant Hill, Iowa State Fairgrounds, Altoona, Bondurant, Prairie Meadows and Adventureland Amusement Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 68 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 107. Interstate 80 between mile markers 109 and 156. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
